name: Con in 60 Seconds
description:
Made for One Minute Jam 2021.

Found this vintage scam email generator on an old floppy disc. 

It features 24 fake identities and over 32,000 message permutations – but only 60 seconds to earn the biggest unethical payday possible.

---

Thanks for downloading ScamMaster2000.

Our advanced A.I. software can help you make an honest living running email scams.

Simply choose a new identity, input a few key phrases, and source some emails.

This free edition of the program is time limited and will run for only 60 seconds.

See how much money you can make!

---

This was my first time using Godot and my first game jam entry. I had loads of ideas to expand the concept further but with a full time job and a toddler around I'm just pleased to have this bare bones experienced finished within the deadline. What a rush!

Alt title: A Scammer Darkly.
